name: Tricky Puzzle Game
description:
Tricky Puzzle Game is an addictive free IQ game you can enjoy with your friends. Get ready to take the quiz and find out if you have a GENIUS brain or not!


Tricky Puzzle Game is a free puzzle game.But...The most obvious answer is usually wrong.You need to be careful and assembled to determine where is the logic, because there are many tricky tasks. And remember, the answer in the test can be hidden on the surface. You need think outside the box!

This is a whole new free puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers and absurd solutions . Are you smart enough to beat your friends’ IQ? Take the cunning test now if you think you’re a GENIUS!
